channel.title: Wilderness (Can't Attack!)
channel.description:
Hello,
I started editting Abbyscap3 Source. But when I was almost done with all non-PK things I found out you can't attack people in the wilderness. The wildy levels are there once you are over the ditch and so is the attack option, it just doesn't work. I need to find a way to make attacking work in the wild.
If the question is not clear feel free to add bosmansyentl@hotmail.com and I'll show you what I mean.

item.title: Wilderness (Can't Attack!)
item.dc:creator: @yB1 yB
item.description:
@yB1 wrote:

Hello,

I started editting Abbyscap3 Source.
But when I was almost done with all non-PK things I found out you can’t attack people in the wilderness.
The wildy levels are there once you are over the ditch and so is the attack option, it just doesn’t work.
I need to find a way to make attacking work in the wild.

If the question is not clear feel free to add bosmansyentl@hotmail.com and I’ll show you what I mean.
